anagariya muni, ge nathi mahana; akkhambanyajanupama wasena, ak rik wajana baju uwam wisin; wanapatichchadanu pamawasena, wana piliseyana beheth uwam wisin; puththaman supama wasena, kathara tharannata kana darumas uwam wisin; ajajhaththika kammadanan, wisin pirimadune; dida dhamma sukha wiharan, dutu dham suwa wahara- diwya bramahma suwawiharayen ek tharakaya-yu seyi; madhukarana sarikkhatha, mi kirimen sudusubawu; kammapala sambandhanka, kamma pala sabanda-kamahi pala athi bawa-yu seyi; ubho khanycha, dejen bakthhu; ubho wisama wakkhula, dejen wama rasiyo.
